name: Richard BEATY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Beaty v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Richard BEATY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of September, 2001, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
Richard BEATY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
No. 93 MAP 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 13, 2001.
